description: With the update of PrettyTable python module, the api has change a little bit. python-novaclient needs to be updated to the new one.
title: Prettytable updated with new api

comments.content: With the update of PrettyTable python module, the api has change a little bit. python-novaclient needs to be updated to the new one.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghe.rivero

comments.content: I know this bug was opened earlier, but the other bug report has more information on the issue. That's why I marked this one as duplicate.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mapleoin

comments.content: Sorry, now I saw that the other bug was for keystone.

Branch:    master

commit d743f92dc2cd25e7dd4bb7571e8542e53d9b7db1
Author: Ghe Rivero <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon May 7 10:06:19 2012 +0200

    Updated to new prettytable api. Fixes bug 995818
    
    In 0.6, printt() (wrapper to get_string) has been removed.
    Updated to use get_string(), backward available since 0.2 release.
    
    Change-Id: Ica292757ec3de5004f27afbc5c8ee11d839421df
